summary: Completed comprehensive testing of deposit and withdrawal charges feature. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Admin settings UI fully functional. Minor frontend navigation issues identified but core functionality verified.

integration_issues.issue: Session management causing redirects to login page during navigation

passed_tests: Admin settings API - transaction charges configuration
Deposit API with charge calculation (2.5% percentage charge)
Withdrawal API with charge calculation logic
Admin Settings UI - Transaction Charges section
Deposit charge type and value configuration
Withdrawal charge type and value configuration
Settings save functionality with success notification
